member.name: T:OFIQ.Core.Exceptions.OFIQException
member.summary: Represents errors that occur during OFIQ operations.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Core.Exceptions.OFIQException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Core.Exceptions.OFIQException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:OFIQ.Core.Exceptions.OFIQException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

member.summary: The overall quality score (0-100).

member.summary: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points.

member.summary: Creates a new point by adding the specified offsets.

The native quality score computed by the measure.

The return code indicating the success or failure of the assessment.

member.summary: The quality measure that was assessed.

member.summary: The native quality score computed by the measure.

member.summary: The quality component value (0-100).

member.name: P:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureResult.ReturnCode
member.summary: The return code indicating the success or failure of the assessment.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the quality measure was successfully computed.

member.name: T:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode
member.summary: Represents the return codes for quality measure assessments.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode.Success
member.summary: The quality measure was successfully computed.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode.FailureToAssess
member.summary: The quality measure could not be assessed due to insufficient data.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode.InternalError
member.summary: The quality measure computation failed due to an internal error.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode.NotImplemented
member.summary: The quality measure is not implemented.

member.name: F:OFIQ.Core.Types.QualityMeasureReturnCode.NotConfigured
member.summary: The quality measure is not configured.
